title: WTB: Old Judges - Rusie, Beckley, Griffith +
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: WTB: Old Judges - Rusie, Beckley, Griffith +
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to purchase a few Old Judges.  In particular, I'm looking for one of Amos Rusie.  I realized recently that there are only 10 HOFers for which I don't own a single card (contemporary or vintage).  Rusie is one of them.  

I'm also looking for a few other OJ HOFers as well  - Beckley, Clarkson, Duffy, Griffith, Mack, McCarthy, McPhee, and Nichols - but my priority is Rusie.

I'm not a huge stickler for technical grades or overall condition (pinholes and creases are okay), but I do like my OJ's to have nice image clarity.

If you have any of those listed above and are looking to part ways with any of them, please contact me privately at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url].
There is a Rusie in REA. I have one but not for sale. Good luck.
